title: Male to Female Ratio Poll
body: Just wanted to know whether there are more male than female players or vice versa

replies.body: take into the account the trolls that are voting on girls when they are boys
Take into account that not all players are using forum, only like 5% or something along the lines are even active/lurking here.
also take into account this is the internet, people lie

> take into the ACCOUNT the trolls that are voting on girls when they are boys

Yea I considered that but I assumed the majority of people on this forum would be honest
If you ask on GD the answer will be girls because "xdxd let's vote gril when am guy"
Best thing I can get to accurate lol.
im a girl. i see way more guys than gurls
This is surprising, I thought league had a community consisting of mainly male players, these results are quite unexpected.
yeah, in that right this poll may not be that accurate, but for me I dont rough statistics. Besides I can't see any more accurate way of executing this.
not really I'm just addicted to statistics
Does it matter what gender people are?
